Skulletron:  See you around.

A metallic, rocket-powered wing sprouts from the robotic side of Skulletro=
n
s back, and from the organic Slaughter side, a slimy, natural wing sprout=
s. 
Skulletron lifts off into the air, and begans to fly onward...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 07:14:36 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

The 5 look at each other, trying to find an answer. Finally, Terminion loo=
ks
back to Skulletron, looking shamed.

Terminion: No...

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 4:34 PM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron:  Don't consider me an enemy so quickly.  I'm just a little moo=
dy
 ok?

He pauses for a moment.

Skulletron:  Can you guys fly?  I think I know a place where we can settle=
..


-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 04:53:15 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

Terminion is perplexed by Skulletron's words.

Terminion: It makes me wonder. Why does such a big talented guy like you
h=
ave to be our enemy? It doesn't make sense. It would make more sense for us=

to be allies, and to be up against all of the insolent who try to ignore
p=
erfectly good characters like ourselves...

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 4:02 AM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron:  Yes, I do.

He spits.

Skulletron:  Unless you think you have a chance of surviving out here.  I
=
know where I'm going.  And I'd hope you know where you are going here,
beca=
use the desert is seemingly endless, unless you get to be my age...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 04:01:02 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

Terminion stops. This time the other 4 stop behind him. Terminion draws a
=
rifle. Monster does so as well. The other 3 draw pistols.

Terminion: Do you really believe we'd follow you after a comment like that=
?.
.

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:56 AM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron stopped angrily, and turned around to face them.

Skulletron:  Look, if it weren't for this damned organic side of me, I
wou=
ldn't have to eat you guys to stay in perfect condition, but I do.  So
shut=
 up or go to the pit!

He points his gun at Terminion.

Skulletron:  I'm having second thoughts on who I will eat first.

He turned around, and continued his long walk...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 03:23:59 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

Terminion stopped and the other 4 start pushing him forward.

Terminion: Hold the internet connection, here, what's this about eating
pe=
ople? It sounds kind of like you're crazy.

Junk Man: There is nothing wrong with being crazy! Don't listen to him, he=
's
so rude.

Terminion: I'M rude? You wrecked my ship!

Junk Man: Shut up...

----- Original Message -----=20
From: LurkerAbyss=20
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=20
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:45 AM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron:  Shut up.  Or else I'll eat you first!

Skulletron sneared and kept on walking...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 02:57:02 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

Mincer: Will this lead us out of the desert?...

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:59 AM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron glared at Terminion sinisterly, and  then looked forward and
co=
ntinued walking...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

Terminion stares.

Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

He looked at the other 4.

Monster: Grr.

Terminion: Okay. Let's go.

They follow Skulletron. Who knows why? They just do...

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 1:32 AM
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


Skulletron looked at the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at=

their feet.

Skulletron:  I've seen too much.  You follow me.  Or else, I will devour y=
ou
  And I'm not kidding.  Don't speak until spoken to.  Don't try anything=

funny, unless you feel like dieing.

The Slaughter(organic) half of him hissed, as slime dripped from his mouth=
 
and body.  Skulletron then began walking forward.  He slipped a gun out f=
rom
a special compartment, and aimed it at Terminion's head, and then dropp=
ed
his arm and gun back down to his side, and continued walking...

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

The Five Felons were just strolling up when this incredible act happened!

Terminion: Hello.

He got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need to.

Terminion: Hello friend.

Junk Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 character limit started=
,
it was tough to survive as a serious character, you just got ignored.

Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on.

Danny: No, stupid, what side are WE on?

Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhead getting decapitated and
disem=
boweled...

----- Original Message -----
From: LurkerAbyss
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
Subject: Character Debut/Return...


OOC:  Yesss, it's here, my first character in this "restart".  God, I hate=

this damn restart.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

BIC:=20

A deserted stretch of land.  A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now
b=
eing replaced by a quick moving area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to
fa=
ll and showered the ground.  Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky. 
=
As time flew by, the storm raged on, getting more violent each minute.  The=

sky suddenly bloomed a dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck=

the earth below.  The wet mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, a=
s
a fist plunged up from the ground!  Another streak of lightning met with =
the
fist.  There was an explosion of sparks, and then the ground started to=

shake vigorously.  The fist started rising out of the ground, and revealed=

an arm.  The arm kept rising, and then another fist and arm popped out of
=
the ground.  Soon, a head was revealed.  The figure started forcing its way=

out of the ground.  The storm had reached its peak of brutality, destroyin=
g
ground and raging on madly.  Within a matter of long, never-ending minute=
s,
the figure stood on two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, so sudde=
nly.
 Everything seemed to stop at that moment.  The rain, everything, just=

disappeared.  The sky was blue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up=

there.  Calm as a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood on the land was
hi=
deous.  It was almost two things merged into one.  One half was metallic,
a=
lmost robotic.  The other half, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a=

hand.......

ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...

                =
                <DIV>A deserted stretch of land.  A sky, 
            =

           =

             =

        =

     =

 =
                               by, the storm raged on, getting more violent=
 
                                each minute.  The sky suddenly bloom=
ed a 
                                dark purple.  A monsterous bolt =
of 
                                lightning struck the earth below. =
 The wet 
                                mud that was once dirt spewed thr=
ough the air, 
                                as a fist plunged up from th=
e ground!  
                                Another streak of lightnin=
g met with the 
                                fist.  There was an ex=
plosion of sparks, 
                                and then the ground sta=
rted to shake 
                                vigorously.  The fist s=
tarted rising

revealed an arm.

, and then another fist and 
                                arm popped out=
 of the ground.  Soon, a head 
                                was rev=
ealed.  The figure started forcing 
                                it=
s way out of the ground.  The storm had 
                             =
   reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground 
                      =
          and raging on madly.  Within a matter of 
                  =
              long, never-ending minutes, the figure stood on 
            =
                    two legs now.  The storm stopped just then, 
     =

ust

he sun was

there.  Calm 
                                as a sleeping baby.&nbsp=

deous.  It was almost two

ed into one.  One half was

almost robotic.  The
